rules.text: No Violence: The promotion of violence, incitement to violence, and/or violent threats are strictly prohibited.
No Illegal Content: Content that is illegal in the United States or the State of Georgia is prohibited.
No trolling, doxing, dogpiling, hate speech, or toxic behavior.
Spam-based and inauthentic accounts are prohibited from signing up on theATL.social.
Adult content, including images, text, and videos, must be labeled with a content warning.
